Porchetta landjaeger tail meatball t-bone spare ribs. Sirloin pork chop bacon pork belly strip steak. Porchetta ham meatball pig salami short ribs jowl spare ribs sirloin tongue jerky cupim chuck.
View layout change animation with Circular Reveal Animation on finish.
Circular Reveal Animation from top with nested animations on end.
Circular Reveal Animation starting from the center of target view.
Circular Reveal Animation starting from touch coordinates.
This activity defines a Explode Enter Transition programmatically. Transitions can be defined either on code or on xml resource files.
Toolbar title is a shared element between MainActivity and this activity.
Blue circle is a shared element between MainActivity and this fragment.
When overlap is true, the enter transition will start as soon as possible. When overlap is false, the enter transition will wait until the exit transition completes before starting.
Sample Activity demonstrating how to use TransitionManager to animate different view properties.
Scenes store the state of a view hierarchy, including all its views and their property values. The transitions framework can run animations between a starting and an ending scene.
Sample Activity demonstrating how to create different CircularReveal animations.
